languages.text: Легко воспламеняющийся прометий — не только высокоэффективное топливо, но и основной источник очищающего огня Инквизиции.

traits.locale_text: Легко воспламеняющийся прометиум — не только высокоэффективное топливо, но и основной источник очищающего огня Инквизиции.

languages.text: Highly flammable promethium can be used not only as a fuel, but is also the main ingredient in the Inquisition's purifying fire.
languages.original_text: Легко воспламеняющийся прометий — не только высокоэффективное топливо, но и основной источник очищающего огня Инквизиции.

traits.locale_text: This highly flammable substance can be used not only as a fuel, and is the main source of the Inquisition's purifying fire.
This highly flammable substance can be used not only as a fuel, and is the main source of the Inquisition's purifying fire.
Highly flammable promethium can be used not only as a fuel, but is also the main ingredient in the Inquisition's purifying fire.

languages.text: 钷素是一种极为易燃的物质。它不仅仅可以用作燃料，同样也是审判庭净化烈焰的主要成分。
languages.original_text: Highly flammable promethium can be used not only as a fuel, but is also the main ingredient in the Inquisition's purifying fire.

traits.locale_text: 钷素是一种极为易燃的物质。它不仅仅可以用作燃料，同样也是审判庭净化烈焰的主要成分。

languages.text: El volátil prometio no solo sirve como combustible, sino que también es el ingrediente principal del fuego purificador de la Inquisición.
languages.original_text: Highly flammable promethium can be used not only as a fuel, but is also the main ingredient in the Inquisition's purifying fire.

traits.locale_text: El volátil prometio no solo sirve como combustible, sino que también es el ingrediente principal del fuego purificador de la Inquisición.

languages.text: 可燃性の高いプロメチウムは、燃料としてだけでなく異端審問庁（インクィジション）の浄火の主成分としても利用できる。
languages.original_text: Highly flammable promethium can be used not only as a fuel, but is also the main ingredient in the Inquisition's purifying fire.

traits.locale_text: 可燃性の高いプロメチウムは、燃料としてだけでなく異端審問庁（インクィジション）の浄火の主成分としても利用できる。

languages.text: Hochentzündliches Promethium kann nicht nur als Treibstoff eingesetzt werden, sondern auch als Hauptzutat des läuternden Feuers der Inquisition.
languages.original_text: Highly flammable promethium can be used not only as a fuel, but is also the main ingredient in the Inquisition's purifying fire.

traits.locale_text: Hochentzündliches Promethium kann nicht nur als Treibstoff eingesetzt werden, sondern auch als Hauptzutat des läuternden Feuers der Inquisition.

languages.text: Très inflammable, le prométhium sert non seulement de carburant, mais également d'ingrédient principal des flammes purificatrices de l'Inquisition.
languages.original_text: Highly flammable promethium can be used not only as a fuel, but is also the main ingredient in the Inquisition's purifying fire.

traits.locale_text: Très inflammable, le prométhium sert non seulement de carburant, mais également d'ingrédient principal des flammes purificatrices de l'Inquisition.

languages.text: Kolayca alev alabilen prometyum yalnızca yakıt olarak kullanılmakla kalmaz, aynı zamanda Engizisyon'un arındırıcı alevinin de ana malzemesidir.
languages.original_text: Highly flammable promethium can be used not only as a fuel, but is also the main ingredient in the Inquisition's purifying fire.
